Model

Class PrimitiveSequentialQuestionDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.AbstractQuestionDriver
      • Model.PrimitiveSequentialQuestionDriver

  • public class PrimitiveSequentialQuestionDriver
extends AbstractQuestionDriver

    Primitive implementation of question driver. Represents the style of the game when questions are read one-by-one (from the cheapest question in current topic to the most expansive and then question the next topic the same way). Generated questions contain only price, other attributes are set to null. Prices are incremented by the same value that is equal to the price of the cheapest question.
